channel.title: 0.8.25 Patch Notes
channel.description:
##General: * Your number also appears by your name under the class picture. * Reduced the number of detailed notifications people receive. Ex. Instead of knowing the possible class that occupied you, it will now simply say you were occupied. * Female model revamped. * New armor and execution added.
##Knight: * No longer healable if committing suicide.
##King: * If the King pardons a player with Decide Fate, that player is no longer able to voted up for the rest of the day. * Now occupy immune. * Guards! and Assist combined. * Guards! now has 3 uses.
##Princess: * Flirt now identifies Killer class types
##Reaper: * Reaper is now Unique. * If something makes the Reaper unhealable, they will no longer be able to revive with souls. Ex. Prince's Execute. * Reaped players now only appear alive for one day. * Reaped players can now speak to the Priest at night.
##Soulcatcher: * If something makes the Soulcatcher unhealable, they will no longer be able to revive with souls. Ex. Prince's Execute.
##Bug Fixes: * If a Noble is converted the same night their twin dies, their twin is no longer converted. * If the voting buttons are somehow still enabled at night, the votes will no longer go through. * Fixed Little Bird bug.

item.title: 0.8.25 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.description:
It helps. I was in a game with dead prince and kept occupying the revived Sheriff until they were like: “Ok just get rid of him we need the info”

Read full topic

item.title: 0.8.25 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: Ellie
item.description:
##General:

  • Your number also appears by your name under the class picture.
  • Reduced the number of detailed notifications people receive. Ex. Instead of knowing the possible class that occupied you, it will now simply say you were occupied.
  • Female model revamped.
  • New armor and execution added.

##Knight:

  • No longer healable if committing suicide.

##King:

  • If the King pardons a player with Decide Fate, that player is no longer able to voted up for the rest of the day.
  • Now occupy immune.
  • Guards! and Assist combined.
  • Guards! now has 3 uses.

##Princess:

  • Flirt now identifies Killer class types

##Reaper:

  • Reaper is now Unique.
  • If something makes the Reaper unhealable, they will no longer be able to revive with souls. Ex. Prince’s Execute.
  • Reaped players now only appear alive for one day.
  • Reaped players can now speak to the Priest at night.

##Soulcatcher:

  • If something makes the Soulcatcher unhealable, they will no longer be able to revive with souls. Ex. Prince’s Execute.

##Bug Fixes:

  • If a Noble is converted the same night their twin dies, their twin is no longer converted.
  • If the voting buttons are somehow still enabled at night, the votes will no longer go through.
  • Fixed Little Bird bug.

Read full topic
